definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: Directed by the warlike Inanna, he penetrates the Sinai peninsula, invades Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 受到好戰的伊娜娜指引，他滲透西奈半島，入侵埃及。

sentences.english: Some of those weapons have already appeared among militants in the Sinai Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 部分這類武器已出現在西奈半島好戰分子的手裏。
